titles.title: Tis Burning In My Soul (nice easy)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}'Tis burning in my soul 'Tis burning in my soul The fire of heav'nly love Is burning in my soul The Holy Spirit came Alll glory to His name The fire of heav'nly love Is burining in my soul{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}God sent His mighty pow'r To this poor sinful heart To keep me ev'ry hour And needful grace impart And since His Spirit came To take supreme control The love enkindled flame Is burning in my soul{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Before the cross I bow Upon the altar lay A willing off'ring now My all from day to day My Savior paid the price My name He sweetly calls Upon the sacrifice The fire from heaven falls{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}No good that I have done His promise I embrace Accepted in the Son He saves me by His grace All glory be to God Let hallelujahs roll His love is shed abroad The fire is in my soul{/lang-eng}
